languages.text: {n}Абеляр мученически вздыхает.{/n} "Хорошо, что вы сказали это мне, а не кому-либо еще. Подобные заявления можно счесть ересью".
{n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing you said that to me and not to someone else. A claim like that could be interpreted as heresy."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр мученически вздыхает.{/n} "Хорошо, что вы сказали это мне, а не кому-либо еще. Подобные заявления можно счесть ересью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing that you said that to me and not someone else. Such claims can be interpreted as heretical."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard pousse un soupir peiné.{/n} « Heureusement que je suis le seul à vous avoir {mf|entendu|entendue} dire cela. Une telle affirmation pourrait être considérée comme un signe d'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing you said that to me and not to someone else. A claim like that could be interpreted as heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard pousse un soupir peiné.{/n} « Heureusement que je suis le seul à vous avoir {mf|entendu|entendue} dire cela. Une telle affirmation pourrait être considérée comme un signe d'hérésie. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard deja escapar un suspiro apesadumbrado.{/n} «Supongo que debería alegrarme de que me haya dicho eso a mí y no a otra persona. Ese tipo de declaraciones podrían considerarse herejía».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing you said that to me and not to someone else. A claim like that could be interpreted as heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard deja escapar un suspiro apesadumbrado.{/n} «Supongo que debería alegrarme de que me haya dicho eso a mí y no a otra persona. Ese tipo de declaraciones podrían considerarse herejía».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德痛苦地叹了口气。{/n}“幸好这句话您只说给了我听，没有说给其他人，因为这样的说法可能会被人当做异端邪说。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing you said that to me and not to someone else. A claim like that could be interpreted as heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德痛苦地叹了口气。{/n}“幸好这句话您只说给了我听，没有说给其他人，因为这样的说法可能会被人当做异端邪说。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは苦しそうにため息をついた。{/n}「他の誰かにではなく、私にそう言ったのは良いことです。そのような主張は異端と解釈されかねない」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing you said that to me and not to someone else. A claim like that could be interpreted as heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは苦しそうにため息をついた。{/n}「他の誰かにではなく、私にそう言ったのは良いことです。そのような主張は異端と解釈されかねない」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard stößt ein gepeinigtes Seufzen aus.{/n} "Ein Glück, dass Ihr das zu mir gesagt habt und nicht zu jemand anderem. Eine solche Aussage könnte als Ketzerei ausgelegt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing you said that to me and not to someone else. A claim like that could be interpreted as heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard stößt ein gepeinigtes Seufzen aus.{/n} "Ein Glück, dass Ihr das zu mir gesagt habt und nicht zu jemand anderem. Eine solche Aussage könnte als Ketzerei ausgelegt werden."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, acılı bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Sanırım bunu başkasına değil de bana söylemiş olmanız iyi bir şey. Böyle bir iddia, kâfirlik olarak yorumlanabilirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a pained sigh.{/n} "I suppose it is a good thing you said that to me and not to someone else. A claim like that could be interpreted as heresy."
